name: Heart Breaker: Sniper
description:
★ 1.99$ -> FREE
★ 3000 OP
★ 3 STAR Rifle

★ The special command assigned to singles!!

Let’s break the couples that whisper love and interfere with the singles who confess love~

★★ Game Features ★★

This game is produced by a developer who has been single for about 30 years with a painful cry, so it expresses the blow from anger just plainly. This game has the following characteristics:

1) It is produced by Full HD, so it provides high-quality splendid graphic.
2) It provides the thrilling blow with the high-quality effect and sound.
4) It is fun to find unique couples that appear in various maps.
5) You can feel the strongest blow with the operation optimized for the SmartPhone.
6) It is plainly exciting with the strategically structured mission. And it is also fun to attack.
7) It is full of excitement with the sense of reality because it reflects the ballistics including the speed of shot or direction of the wind.
8) It provides various sniping rifles and auxiliary equipment.

★★ The targets ★★

1) Singles confessing love
2) Couples holding hands
3) Couples wearing couple’s clothes
4) Couples kissing in a public place
5) Couples being happy in a duck boat
6) All the other lower inanimate couples in pairs
